body:
Commit fa52a2c7b81817694c3aeddb7f6909334b8c9132

Steps to reproduce:

```
FILE_ENV="./ci/test/00_setup_env_arm.sh" MAKEJOBS="-j9" ./ci/test_run_all.sh
```


```
 node0 2019-12-17T20:54:35.953253Z [] ThreadRPCServer method=getblockcount user=__cookie__ 
 test  2019-12-17T20:54:35.959000Z TestFramework.node0 (DEBUG): RPC successfully started 
 test  2019-12-17T20:54:35.966000Z TestFramework (ERROR): Assertion failed 
                                   Traceback (most recent call last):
                                     File "/home/marco/bitcoin/build/bitcoin-arm-linux-gnueabihf/test/functional/test_framework/test_framework.py", line 112, in main
                                       self.run_test()
                                     File "/home/marco/bitcoin/build/bitcoin-arm-linux-gnueabihf/test/functional/rpc_bind.py", line 89, in run_test
                                       self._run_loopback_tests()
                                     File "/home/marco/bitcoin/build/bitcoin-arm-linux-gnueabihf/test/functional/rpc_bind.py", line 97, in _run_loopback_tests
                                       [('127.0.0.1', self.defaultport)])
                                     File "/home/marco/bitcoin/build/bitcoin-arm-linux-gnueabihf/test/functional/rpc_bind.py", line 43, in run_bind_test
                                       assert_equal(set(get_bind_addrs(pid)), set(expected))
                                     File "/home/marco/bitcoin/build/bitcoin-arm-linux-gnueabihf/test/functional/test_framework/util.py", line 46, in assert_equal
                                       raise AssertionError("not(%s)" % " == ".join(str(arg) for arg in (thing1, thing2) + args))
                                   AssertionError: not(set() == {('7f000001', 16456)})
title: test: rpc_bind.py --ipv4 fails when run on s390x or arm in debian
